title: recipes_Seafood_Sandwich
text:
Title: Seafood Sandwich.
.
Description: This awesome sandwich is reminiscent of the famous Maine Lobster Roll, and made with ingredients that are easy to find..
.
Ingredients:.
- 1 (8 ounce) package imitation crab or lobster meat.
- 0.25 cup mayonnaise.
- 1 tablespoon finely chopped red onion.
- 1 teaspoon lemon juice.
- 0.25 teaspoon OLD BAYÂ® Seasoning.
- 1 tablespoon butter, softened.
- 2 hot dog buns.
.
Instructions:.
- In a medium bowl, flake the crabmeat, and mix in mayonnaise, onion, lemon juice and Old Bay seasoning. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes to allow the flavors to mingle..
- Spread butter on the inside of the hot dog buns, and toast under the broiler. Fill buns with the crab salad, and serve..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 478 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 40 g.
cholesterolContent: 48 mg.
fiberContent: 2 g.
proteinContent: 13 g.
saturatedFatContent: 8 g.
sodiumContent: 1413 mg.
sugarContent: 10 g.
fatContent: 30 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 2 servings.
